price: ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߓߍߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߙߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߘߎ߱ ߛߍ߲ߞߍ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߟߎ߫ ߓߋ߬ ߜߘߊߜߘߊ߫
arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
